audioText: Son corps tremblait vachement après avoir été confronté carrément à cette réalité terrifiante qu'il ne pouvait plus ignorer.
question: How was his body reacting after the confrontation?
options: It was completely still and calm
It was moving energetically and confidently
It showed no physical reaction at all
explanation: The text states 'Son corps tremblait vachement après avoir été confronté carrément à cette réalité terrifiante' - His body was trembling really badly after being directly confronted with this terrifying reality. 'Corps' means body, 'vachement' means really/very (informal), and 'carrément' means directly/completely.
source: Physical reaction to terrifying confrontation with reality
